properties.name: currency
properties.summary: an ISO4217 currency code, a three letter sequence like "USD". For use with dojo.currency only.

properties.name: fractional
properties.summary: Whether to include the fractional portion, where the number of decimal places are implied by the currency or explicit 'places' parameter. The value [true,false] makes the fractional portion optional. By default for currencies, it the fractional portion is optional.

properties.name: locale
properties.summary: override the locale used to determine formatting rules

properties.name: pattern
properties.summary: override formatting pattern with this string. Default value is based on locale. Overriding this property will defeat localization. Literal characters in patterns are not supported.

properties.name: places
properties.summary: fixed number of decimal places to accept. The default is determined based on which currency is used.

properties.name: strict
properties.summary: strict parsing, false by default. Strict parsing requires input as produced by the format() method. Non-strict is more permissive, e.g. flexible on white space, omitting thousands separators

properties.name: symbol
properties.summary: localized currency symbol. The default will be looked up in table of supported currencies in dojo.cldr A ISO4217 currency code will be used if not found.

properties.name: type
properties.summary: Should not be set. Value is assumed to be currency.
